snippet: Guantánamo Bay should stay open, at least for the short term, because the alternatives are worse.
abstract: Op-Ed article by law professor Jennifer Daskal reflects on her change of heart about closing of Guantanamo Bay Naval Base prison facility, which she once publicly advocated; contends that prison facility must remain open, if only because alternatives are far worse.
lead_paragraph: Guantánamo Bay should stay open, at least for the short term, because the alternatives are worse.
